description.value: The Character can spend a Fate Point to make All Melee Attacks they make that round unavoidable by Parry or Dodge Skills. Other methods of stopping attacks, such as Shadow or Displacement Fields are unaffected.

system.benefit: The Character can spend a Fate Point to make All Melee Attacks they make that round unavoidable by Parry or Dodge Skills. Other methods of stopping attacks, such as Shadow or Displacement Fields are unaffected.

specialAbilities.name: Unavoidable Strike
specialAbilities.description: Spend a Fate Point to make all melee attacks you make this round unavoidable by Parry or Dodge skills. Other defenses (Shadow Fields, Displacement Fields) still function.
